SPELLS.description: Deal 6 Damage to a Target

SPELLS.name: Wall of Fire
SPELLS.description: Deal 3-6 damage to every enemy in a selected row.

SPELLS.description: Deal 8-12 damage to an adjacent target.

SPELLS.name: Blizzard
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-4 damage to all enemies. Has a small chance to stun them.

SPELLS.name: Entangle
SPELLS.description: Summon vines to a row, dealing 2-4 damage and having a chance to root enemies in place.

SPELLS.name: Freeze
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-6 damage to a target and freeze them, stunning them for a turn.

SPELLS.name: Chain Lightning
SPELLS.description: Deal 2-6 damage per target to 3 targets.

SPELLS.description: All allies are restored +15 Stamina.

SPELLS.description: Heal a target for 5 HP.

SPELLS.name: Ferocity
SPELLS.description: Your damaging spells do +2 DMG per target this turn.

SPELLS.name: Harvest Blight
SPELLS.description: Consume all enemy poison & venom debuffs, dealing half their remaining damage this turn.

graves.DESCRIPTION: Quite a tall man with a muscular frame, his face boasts a *GREEN*frog-like*GREY* countenanceâ€”namely his wide-set eyes. His resilience transformed him from a humble *BLUE*peasant*GREY* to a revered *YELLOW*hero*GREY* of the town.

graves.DESCRIPTION: A thin man with sharp *BLUE*blue eyes*GREY*. He is a well-known *CYAN*duelist mage*GREY*, who is said to have never been *RED*defeated*GREY*. . .
